it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.socket

Class SocketPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.RemotePlayer2
      • it.polimi.se2018.alternative_network.newserver.socket.SocketPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketPlayer
extends RemotePlayer2
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class that extends the RemotePlayer in order to define a Socket Player. This class will be used to manage every socket player as a thread.
    Author:
    DavideMammarella

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Connection closer for socket player. This method close the connection of the client and tell it to the remote player.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Method used to remove a player from the server. This method will also set the playerRunning boolean to false in order to remove correctly the user.

      • kickPlayerOut

        public void kickPlayerOut()
        Description copied from class: RemotePlayer2
